statements: DELETE FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE customer_id = 123 AND loan_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE credit_score < 600 AND repayment_history LIKE '%delayed%'
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE age > 50 AND credit_score < 600
DELETE FROM LoanRepayments WHERE customer_id = 10 AND repayment_date = '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE age > 30 AND employment_status = 'Employed';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status='rejected' AND customer_id=100;
DELETE FROM RepaymentHistory WHERE payment_date<'2022-01-01' AND customer_id=200;
